prompts: Create a sleek blue Dragon-type Pokemon with elegant wings and a streamlined body.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a blue aircraft, soaring gracefully in the sky.
Design a legendary Pokemon with a powerful gaze and an aura of mystique.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies speed and agility with a striking blue color scheme.
Generate a mythical creature that can navigate through both mountains and seas effortlessly.
Make a Pokemon that has a unique blend of dragon and psychic abilities.
Give me a Pokemon that reflects both elegance and strength, with a vibrant blue hue.
